title: Electrical Engineer Job at Ascentech Services Limited
content:
Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Electrical Engineer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Design and develop electrical systems and components for electronic devices.
	Conduct feasibility studies and cost analyses for new projects.
	Troubleshoot and resolve electrical issues in prototypes and production units.
	Develop and maintain technical documentation, including schematics and design specifications.
	Collaborate with mechanical and software engineers to create integrated solutions.
	Perform testing and validation of electrical designs to ensure reliability and performance.
	Stay updated with industry standards and emerging technologies to implement best practices in electrical design.


Requirements


	B.Sc. in Electrical Engineering, B.Tech. or related field (e.g., Mechatronics).
	5 - 7 years of relevant experience (for mid-level roles) Experience with electrical systems design, installation, and maintenance.
	M.Sc.is an added advantage for senior roles. Certifications& Licensing Professional Engineering (PE)license (optional but preferred).
	Certifications (e.g., PMP, AutoCAD, PLC, OSHA Electrical Safety).


Technical Skills:


	Proficiency in AutoCAD, ETAP, MATLAB, EPLAN, or similar software.
	Circuit design,PLCs,SCADA, control systems.
	Ability to read schematics, blueprints, and technical documentation. Knowledge of NFPA,NEC,IEEE standards.


Soft Skills:


	Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
	Team work, communication, and attention to detail.
	Good project and time management skills.
	Physical &Work Conditions
	Willingness to work on-site or in industrial settings.
	Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.
	Willingness to travel when required.


Desirable Skills:


	Knowledge of renewable energy and energy-saving systems. Experience with Lean, Six Sigma, or continuous improvement tools.
	Preventive and predictive maintenance knowledge.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cv@ascentech.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
